title: Golang Struct Embedding
description: This lab aims to test your understanding of struct embedding in Golang. You will be required to create a struct that embeds another struct and access its fields and methods.

meta.title: Mastering Struct Embedding in Golang
meta.description: Explore the power of struct embedding in Golang, a crucial concept for building modular and composable code.
meta.keywords: go playground, composition, go, programming tutorial, golang, struct embedding, go labs, go playground online, code modularization, go lab

verify.name: Verify Correct Output of struct-embedding.go
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go语言结构体嵌入
i18n.description: 本实验旨在测试你对Go语言中结构体嵌入的理解。你需要创建一个嵌入另一个结构体的结构体，并访问其字段和方法。

meta.title: 精通Go语言中的结构体嵌入
meta.description: 探索Go语言中结构体嵌入的强大功能，这是构建模块化和可组合代码的关键概念。
meta.keywords: Go语言游乐场, 组合, Go语言, 编程教程, Go语言, 结构体嵌入, Go语言实验, 在线Go语言游乐场, 代码模块化, Go语言实验
